homeAbout.title: Official national body for swimming, water polo and distance swimming
homeAbout.text: The Swimming Federation of Macedonia works on organizing, developing and improving aquatic sports at a national level. In cooperation with clubs, coaches and expert commissions, the Federation prepares competition calendars, regulations, criteria and official record lists, as well as activities related to national team selections.
homeAbout.note: Official documents and criteria are published in the relevant sections by discipline (Swimming/Waterpolo/Distance Swimming).

stats.label: Registered clubs and active members working to develop swimming across the country.
Official national records by event, category and pool type (25m/50m).
Organization and sanctioning of national competitions, championships and cups throughout the year.

records.title: National Records

intro.p1: Browse official national swimming records by pool length and gender. Use the controls to switch between 25m (short course) and 50m (long course).

list.3: The full official list (source of truth)

intro.p2: The highlights below are just a quick overview — always refer to the PDFs for the complete and official data.

records.noteText: Highlights are informational only. In case of any mismatch, the official PDF document is always the authoritative source.

preview.title: PDF Preview
preview.sub: Use zoom and scroll inside the frame. If it doesn't load, open the PDF directly.
